title: Drawing, "Recto: Sheep Grazing", probably 1875–78
markings: Watermark: "Damask Linene" and hand holding a rose
signed: Verso: Signed with initials in ?, at lower right: ?
inscribed: Recto: Inscribed in graphite: Hard-a-Port; and again erased: "A Quick Passage from Europe."
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Recto: Horizontal view with the  upper portion showing the trunk of a chestnut tree with grazing sheep, and the lower portion showing a steep hillside with grazing sheep.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Recto: Sheep Grazing", probably 1875–78.
probably 1875–78. Graphite on gray-green paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-54.
